court: HIGH COURT OF KERALA AT ERNAKULAM
outcome: Petition filed under section 482 Cr.P.C. 2. Petitioners are accused in Crime No.2549 of 2018 of Kottarakara Police Station registered for the offences under sections 294(b), 308, 324, 326 and 447 IPC.
full_text: Laas Gets a ral Pa IN THE HIGH COURT OF KERALA AT ERNAKULAM 201/KER/169 PRESENT THE HONOURABLE MR. JUSTICE K.ABRAHAM MATHEW THURSDAY ,THE O3RD DAY OF JANUARY 2019 / 13TH POUSHA, 1940 Cr1.MC.No. 8936 of 2018 CRIME NO. 2549/2018 OF Kottarakkara Police Station , Kollam PETITIONERS /ACCUSED :- 1 SASTDHARAN PILLAT AGED 65 YEARS VALIYARKUZHUVILA, PALLICKAL, MYLOM, KOTTRAKARA, KOLLAM 2 KRISHNAN KUTTY NAIR AGED 68 YEARS BINDHU BHAVAN, PALLICKAL, MYLOM , KOTTARAKARA, KOLLAM BY ADV. SRI.SYAM J SAM RESPONDENTS/STATE :- 1 STATE OF KERALA REPRESENTED BY PUBLIC PROSECUTOR, HIGH COURT OF KERALA 2 GOPAKUMAR AGED 62 YEARS S/O. GOPALA PILLAI, ARYA BHAVAN, PALLICKAL, MYLOM, KOTTRAKARA, KOLLAM - 691 001. BY ADV. SMT.JISHA P.C. R1 BY SRI C S HRITHWIK-PUBLIC PROSECUTOR THIS CRIMINAL MISC. CASE HAVING COME UP FOR ADMISSION ON 03.01.2019, THE COURT ON THE SAME DAY PASSED THE FOLLOWING: Pisgah baat Crl.MC.No. 8936 of 2018 2019 IKERITO? 2 ORDER Petition filed under section 482 Cr.P.C. 2. Petitioners are accused in Crime No.2549 of 2018 of Kottarakara Police Station registered for the offences under sections 294(b), 308, 324, 326 and 447 IPC. The second respondent is the victim. It is submitted that the matter has been settled and the proceedings in the trial court may be quashed. 3. Heard the learned counsel for the petitioners and second respondent and the learned Public Prosecutor. 4. I have perused the affidavit filed by the second respondent, who has entered appearance through counsel. I am satisfied that the matter has been settled and no public interest is involved in this case. There is no impediment for granting the prayer of the petitioners. In the result, this Crl.M.C is allowed. The proceedings in Crime No.2549 of 2018 of pee el Terres a Soe Biase Crl.MC.No. 8936 of 2018 2019 IKERITO? 3 Kottarakara Police Station are quashed. If any material objects have been produced in this case, the trial court may pass appropriate orders for their disposal. K.ABRAHAM MATHEW, JUDGE SMA Buse Laas Gets a ral Bases Cr1.MC.No, 8936 of 2018 2019/KER/169 4 APPENDIX PETITIONER'S/S ANNEXURES :- ANNEXURE Al THE TRUE COPY OF THE FIR IN CRIME NUMBER 2549/2018 OF KOTTARAKARA POLICE STATION ANNEXURE A2 THE TRUE COPY OF THE AFFIDAVIT FILED BY THE SECOND RESPONDENT RESPONDENT (S)' ANNEXURES :- NIL / / TRUE CoPy/ / PA TO JUDGE SMA
